title: Group of (5) Old Judge Die Cuts for sale
author: autograf

posts.post_title: Group of (5) Old Judge Die Cuts for sale
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]$1750 OBO[/STRIKE] $1500 OBO.  Paypal friends or check/money order.
(3) Bencke litho and (2) Knapp Litho.

[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-DL_WI9a4s1Q/U6oDJvsBAsI/AAAAAAAAcI8/BFgoa2UblSM/s800/Scan%252052.jpeg[/img]

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-mmC6CfH68gY/U6oDN7_la3I/AAAAAAAAcI8/Fxxc8rIar4Q/s800/Scan%252053.jpeg[/img]

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-lGiFed50E44/U6oDN6P5-kI/AAAAAAAAcI8/h-wC9EqAEPc/s800/Scan%252054-5.jpeg[/img]
from a super advertising set. It's already a difficult set to put together and the Bencke examples rarely seem to come up when compared to the Knapp.
Henry--I heard everything but "I'll take them." Tom needs some business--step up.
as I already have the set missing only one that's not in the group. You could help him out - you have more money than god and the guy has many kids to feed for goodness sakes.

moved to ebay with better pictures...........take a look............
